architectural_notes: Motoko canister should implement http_request query handler with method+path routing; return JSON for specific endpoints and HTML landing page for all other paths.
Add CORS headers to JSON responses and support OPTIONS for any path by returning 204 with CORS headers.
known_issues: /auth/google/start currently returns HTML landing page instead of JSON due to missing/incorrect HTTP routing in Motoko canister.

existing_features.title: Create a minimal frontend shell with a coherent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) applied consistently across the app, without adding additional product features beyond a basic landing scaffold.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a dart scoring backend service (API + data model)
Implement a Motoko backend canister that persists dart scoring data models and exposes a Candid API to manage games, players, and scoring events.
Provide API methods to create and query games and players, including the ability to start a new game with rules and retrieve game state by id.
Implement dart scoring logic and an API to record throws/turns and compute scores according to standard rules, including bust handling and optional double-out finishing.
Add backend-side validation, error handling, and deterministic IDs for stable operation (no traps on invalid input).

Fix Motoko canister HTTP routing: handle req.method+req.url, add JSON endpoints (/health, /auth/google/start, /auth/google/callback), CORS headers, and OPTIONS preflight (204) while keeping HTML landing page fallback.

Implement or fix the canister HTTP request handler (`http_request` as a `query`) in `backend/main.mo` so it routes based on `req.method` and the URL path parsed from `req.url` (ignore any query string).

Add HTTP routing for the following endpoints in the Motoko HTTP handler:
- `GET /health` returns `200` JSON body `{"ok": true}`
- `GET /auth/google/start` returns `200` JSON body `{"ok": true, "message": "google start reached"}`
- `GET /auth/google/callback` returns `200` JSON body `{"ok": true, "message": "google callback reached"}`
For all other HTTP paths (non-matching routes), continue returning the existing HTML landing page response (status 200, `Content-Type: text/html`).

Add CORS headers to all JSON responses returned by the Motoko HTTP handler:
- `Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *`
- `Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET,POST,PUT,OPTIONS`
- `Access-Control-Allow-Headers: Content-Type, Authorization, X-ADMIN-TOKEN`
Handle `OPTIONS` requests for any path in the Motoko HTTP handler by returning status `204` with the specified CORS headers and an empty body.
